website_summaries.verdict: These sunglasses are packed with features for a price that is considerably lower than most by the brand. Treat them with extra care to maximize your investment.
pros: Built for fun in the sun thanks to the saltwater-resistant metal, lightweight design, polarized lenses, and flexible nose pads and hinges
cons: The downside to the ultra-lightweight build is that they're more delicate

customer_reviews.title: Suspected cheap knock offs
customer_reviews.text: This was the second pair of Maui Jim Sugar Beach sunglasses I've purchased. I lost the first pair in the ocean, and they were absolutely excellent. I've long suspected that this pair was not truly Maui Jim manufactured as the lenses scratched very soon after purchasing them. I've owned nothing but Maui Jim sunglasses for at least the last 15 years, and I've NEVER had a single scratch. Then last evening the frame snapped completely in half rendering the sunglasses totally useless. I love Maui Jim sunglasses, but I'll never buy another pair from this particular vendor (optima.com).
customer_reviews.author: JCWalton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I finally found a pair of year-round, multi-weather high quality glasses. I have several Ray-ban and a few Maui Jim's. Each one for a different reason. There's nothing wrong with them at all. It's just this pair meets all needs & expectations for me. I did adjust the bridge a tiny bit. Sunglasses should not touch your cheeks. And the final test- looked down and shook my head. They are not coming off. They didn't even move! I have a round/oval medium size face. Very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses but could be more durable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These are very good quality lenses with accurate color rendition and scratch resistance Very light weight Great looking sunglasses at a low price Cons: Seem somewhat fragile Just the other day I was cleaning them and somehow broke off the plastic nose pad. Also a few weeks before that, the arm came completely off the lens, but I was able to snap back on. I've only had these for 3 and 1/2 months so I'm sure Maui Jim will repair/replace, but still not real impressed with the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: I wear them everyday
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have both worn these exact glasses for the past couple years. She has the root bear color and I have black. We both actually have lost a pair and both purchased same ones again. They are that great. They are supper light and you can barley feel them on your face, however, they stay on well and I've never had them fall off my face. Best part is they are about $30-$50 cheaper on Amazon then in a store. I highly recommend these. I wear them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Amazing Polarization
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a Ray Ban customer for decades. I decided to try Maui Jim’s for a change. They are a lot more comfortable and they stay on my face! I wore them to the lake yesterday and the colors of nature were amazing and brilliant. The polarization is the best I’ve ever seen. I love the lenses and will buy again. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyed Girl

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty convinced these are the best sunglasses ever! They’re so lightweight I’ve had to make sure they’re still on my face—great for everyday use, less so for hot air balloon rides where you’re looking over the edge at all the sights! Had to take them off for the latter, but still highly diggable.
customer_reviews.author: Renwaugh

customer_reviews.title: Terrific but weak at the bridge
customer_reviews.text: This my 2nd pair. First ones broke at the nose bridge after 3 yrs. I ordered a new pair to replace them because: - They are featherweight, and I really mean it. - I like the lens and frame colors. - The lenses are great and do the job I need in the southern U.S. plains area. The 4 out of 5 stars had to do with the fact that I thought these glasses should've lasted longer without breaking at the nose bridge.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Boone

customer_reviews.title: very light weight
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have the plastic frame that is very bendy. I tried soaking the temple arms in hot water to get them adjusted and the adjustment lasts about 10 minutes and they go back to their original shape. I feel (but have not tested) that if you sat on these, they would not get damaged and would bounce back. Also being all plastic, they should hold up to salt water much better than many glasses. They are extremely light-weight and you barely notice the weight on your face. Excellent at reducing glare.
customer_reviews.author: RickCNC

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim doesn’t honor warranty when you buy from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Too fragile. Purchased in January 2018. Broke at the bridge by March. Just took them out of the case and they were broken. Maui Jim would not honor the warranty despite that glasses were still under the time period and i didn’t do anything to break them . Paid $53. For the repair.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these glasses for a week. Firstly, I saved $65 buying them on Amazon. .. they are incredibly comfortable and light. The little arms are flexible abut seem strong. The lenses are very clear and block out glare and sunlight really well. They are the most comfortable sunglasses I have ever worn, as well as the most expensive. But I must say that I won't wear cheap glasses again! I did purchase a string so that the glasses wouldn't fall off and scratch, as I have a tendency to drop my glasses often. I have purchased cheap sunglasses in the past which always broke quickly or scratched to the point where I couldn't see out of them well.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Lover

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shades ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Most comfortable shades ever. I love them. I can sum it all up in one true story. I was in San Francisco ready to go out of the hotel door and into the city for adventure. Couldn't find my shades, I'm looking everywhere, wife looks at me and says: "you have them on". True story. After a while you forget you have them on.
customer_reviews.author: AWB

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love Maui Jims!
customer_reviews.text: As with other Maui Jim rimless glasses, these are extremely lightweight and therefore very delicate! Don't panic, though: I've had similar rimless Maui Jims that have lasted me years with proper care. Always handle by the bridge (particularly when cleaning) to avoid stressing the hinge. If you're going to be doing outdoor sports or vigorous hiking, consider some of their sports-line sunglasses. These shades are wonderful for everyday use. I would strongly recommend polarized Maui Jims to everyone. The improvement over traditional sunglasses is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: CC Mac

customer_reviews.title: Don't set them down!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 of these exact sunglasses. 4, only because I have lost 2 of them. The bad news is that thieves like them too. Don't set them down!!! I wear hearing aids and am fond of baseball caps. The combination makes wearing sunglasses uncomfortable...at least until I discovers these Maui Jim's. Great sun protection and yet light and comfortable. But don't set them down!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!! Second Pair!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Maui Jim Sugar Beach Sunglasses - Polarized. This is actually the second pair I have past year. The first pair were unfortunately lost to the waters of the Yucatan Peninsula during a spill from a Jet Ski. The glasses are very stylish and comfortable on your head. The lenses and frames are so light you hardly know they are there. I have received quite a few compliments on these since my most recent purchase with on friend even wanting to trade for a different model of Maui Jims.
customer_reviews.author: bigrobstunner

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sunglasses I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Between these and the breakwalls, my days of seeking out the best sunglasses are over. They are really light weight and sit on your head without you even noticing. My sister in law has a variety of illnesses and needs glasses for light sensitivity. These are perfect because they don't squeeze her head and cause headaches....and they look good too. I've turned quite a few people on to these in the last year. Give them a try, you won't be let down. Also, keep them away from your dog as they can be turned into scraps in a matter of seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Mark - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you wait for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice if you wait for a good price. Sunglasses prices are obscene and it took months to see the price come down. Otherwise pleased. These are extremely light weight which I find good. Come in a soft cloth carrying case. Note: I do not have prime since Amazon.com does not stand behind their BS mark-up service.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Had to have another pair!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a additional pair that I paid way more for at a fish and sports store. They are very light while wearing and hold securely to my face when working. Ideal for wearing all day. I like the lighter tint for transition from outside to indoors without having to remove them and Maui clarity is fantastic. These are sized well for us larger folks and may be to big for smaller faces, unless you're going for the oversized look.
customer_reviews.author: solara8

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shading
customer_reviews.text: These maui jim shades are GREAT. I have owned a pair " of different style" in the past, that last for about 9 years. I took these pair to Europe and they were so comfortable to wear, I NEVER felt the need to remove them due to weight or discomfort. The only thing you may want to consider if you are of "slim facial features" is to order a neck strap, this way you are sure not to drop these as you look downward, if needs be.
customer_reviews.author: JoFer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I've had two pairs as I like how light they are and they fit my face. Alas both broke in the exact same place, where the arm meets the lens. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Green lens is just the shade of green I was looking for. These are very light, almost too light but super comfortable. Need to be careful with these. One of the ear pieces “ snapped off” from where it connects to the lens. I was happily surprised that it easily snapped back on. Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.author: GPSS

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight - easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so light, I worry I'll break them, but they are a dream to wear and I love the look. They are smaller and lighter than the pair of Maui Jim's from ~2010 I was replacing. Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: G. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are the MOST comfortable sunglasses I’ve ever owned!! I’m on my third pair. Not because of the quality of the glasses, I lost a pair then broke another. They are so light I can hardly notice I’m wearing sunglasses and they block the sun very well. If need be, I’d purchase another pair. Totally LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineJean

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim Has a Product in These Sunglasses Worthy of the Company's Reputation!
customer_reviews.text: Even though the picture makes this model look rounder than they actually are, Maui Jim makes such a high standard of sunglasses, shape does not matter much to me. That they are Maui Jim's are good enough for me. Maui Jim are to sunglasses what Amazon.com is to distribution and online sales institutions. Both are standard setters for all the rest. Thus said, everything good that has been said about these sunglasses I endorse. They're the best. PERIOD!
customer_reviews.author: W. Dent

customer_reviews.title: Light and perfectly unisex
customer_reviews.text: These are the most lightweight comfortable sunglasses I’ve ever owned. I have LOTS of sunglasses including Tory Burch, Kate Spade, Jimmy Choo and Banana Republic. These are THE BEST!! My husband wears them too and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and I still love them Comfortable as anything I've ever worn and does the job reducing glare. I'm worried they'll discontinue the style. Sigh. Update,2/13/16...Maui Jim stands behind their products big time. The stem broke on these after how long???? Sent them to Maui Jim, paid a $10 processing fee and they replaced both stems ...good as new. They have a champion in me for sure. All done within 10 days. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: D.Penn

customer_reviews.title: No sport case
customer_reviews.text: glasses are fine so far but what happened to the sport case to protect them in??????"???
customer_reviews.author: Windy B

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves that it’s so light. But side arm broke off. We called Maui Jim. They replaced for small cost when warranty ran out. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: These are very, very light on my face which was the main reason I spent so much money on sunglasses; cheaper ones tend to hurt my face and head after wearing them. While wearing them, everything looks very crisp and clear, again unlike cheaper sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jims all the way!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these shades as I had my first pair for over 10 years. Once they are properly cleaned they will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: AngeLight

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: My fourth pair of various Maui Jims. I liked the styling of these lenses and minimalist frame. Price was good, about $20 less than everyone else. The reason for -1 star is only because the nose pads are just a bit too narrow for the bridge of my nose. I may contemplate heating the plastic a bit and bending them out as it tends to pinch my nose, even with the very low weight. Otherwise, great MJ optics and great Amazon service.
customer_reviews.author: Haverhill

customer_reviews.title: Shop for the best
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses that make your face relax when you put them on. Not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I got a pair as a gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I got a pair as a gift and lost them. I've never spent more than $15 on a pair of sunglasses, but I just had to replace these. The lenses are great -- really clear vision. And they're super lightweight which makes them so comfortable to wear. After wearing these exclusively for a year, I can't find another pair that felt so good or looked so good on me. I. LOVE. THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Just too big for a small face
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim makes fantastic glasses. I had a pair for ten years that finally broke. I don't wish to look at another brand. However, I have a small face and these glasses are HUGE! The frames are too wide for my face, the arm length is way too long, and the lenses cover my eyes and cheeks, too! So for small ladies, please beware!
customer_reviews.author: Central

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these sunglasses for about 5 years! I only bought a new pair because i lost the old ones. Maui Jim has an awesome repair department and a good warranty as long as you keep your receipt (which is so easy to access on Amazon). They are light as a feather! You cannot feel them when wearing them, and they never hurt my ears like some others do. Great sun and glare protection, plus they are cute aviators. cannot say enough good things!
customer_reviews.author: camille Flournoy

customer_reviews.title: Frames are just too thin.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were just to thin. They broke easily. I love Maui Jim’s and wanting to try this less expensive option. I would Not do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Leeper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but too small
customer_reviews.text: They are too small for my head size. Other than that they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Rode

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses and Service
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these sunglasses. they gave me an estimated arrival date of April 24 to May 4. I was happy to see it at the door on April 11. I love Maui Jim glasses. They block all the harmful sun rays, glare, and even problems that creep in on the sides, top, and bottom. I am so happy they got here early, as the harsh sun is starting early this year!
customer_reviews.author: U’ilani

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these glasses because I had to send two pair back for repairs and needed a pair for work. Own several pair and these did not disappoint. Maui Jim sunglasses are the best, second to none!
customer_reviews.author: eddiebauerjr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Very lightweight and they look great. Eye protection is top-notch. Shipping was slower than I expected due to the fact that I was required to pay $18 for expedited shipping. It should be made clear that it is coming through customs from overseas if being shipped to the US, so it truly was expedited, even though it took longer than most standard shipping items. The price was good and I recommend the store.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Herron

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Update 2/1/17: I lost one of the nose pads somehow. Looked various places online to order new ones but couldn't find. Called company to order and they sent me new ones no charge. I really like these sunglasses and company. Best sunglasses I have ever owned. Light, clear, fits perfect, not tight or loose and doesn't move in normal, moderate activity.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: For me, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using them for years. Light weigth, cool looking, durable. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: M. VDH.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. So clear and perfect fit to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Great optics.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement of the same Sandy Beach glasses the helped limit my injuries during a face first bike crash several weeks ago. The original glasses broke at the bridge but protected my face (somewhat) from the pavement. I love the light feel and fit of the glasses. The MJ optics are there without the bulk and weight of a full frame.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wright

customer_reviews.title: ... Maui Jim sun glasses are my wife and my favorite brand in the last 6-7 years
customer_reviews.text: The Maui Jim sun glasses are my wife and my favorite brand in the last 6-7 years. we have been using them for that long, the glare is reduced significantly, clarity of colors is unmatched and their lightness is a winner. By far one of the best brands and best lenses - and the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: udibd

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sunglasses I have ever worn. I keep forgetting that I have them on. Have gone shopping several times, and have been well into the store before realizing I was still wearing them. I thought they were expensive, but they were worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The color of the lenses is not the same as the previous glasses, the previous lenses were better, a little darker.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Calle

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!!!! Small enough of my for my face (female) but great coverage. They are very light weight but do not slip off my nose. The case they came with is tiny but my local eye care Dr's office gave me a large Maui Jim case for free. The lenses can't be beat. Bought my first pair of Maui Jim glasses 4 yrs ago for $200 and used them everyday, $ well spent.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $150
customer_reviews.text: Very light, classy sunglasses but so flimsy it twists and turns so that they don't sit straight on my face. I'm returning them. I expected better for $150
customer_reviews.author: mljchong

customer_reviews.title: Lovvvvvvve iiit !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one In Maui and love it but unfortunately i crack the lense btween the bridge so i sent to repair. I cant wait and found it on Amazon and different color lenses. Bought it , love it. Amazing how clear it is compared to others sunglasses. You wont regret. Con.. its delicate but you can always find a Maui jim with metal frame.
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight.  Excellent glasses
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably comfortable, very good looking glasses. Very lightweight as well so you can wear them for a long period of time without issue. I really like the sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: NJA

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sun glasses, very light to wear, particularly if you play golf, not too dark. The only issue is that they are quite fragile, I bought one in November, and last month I broke in my pocket wit a little pressure against my body. I just bought a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, I've bought three pairs
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this model with the blue/green glasses. I use them everywhere, they're the only ones I use everyday for power walking for they do not move an inch. And they're so light you don't feel you're wearing anything. Now I bought them in brown-second brown pair for I lost one. Only bad thing about them is that they're very fragile, I forced my blue/green ones into a case just a little bit and broke them, but I sent them to Maui Jim and they fixed them for about $50, which is much less than I paid for them originally so that seems like a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina García- Menocal

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are the best!!!! Super light weight so you might want to buy the strap if you are going to be on the water. My husband will only wear Maui Jims. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses are great but the actual sunglass box was damaged pretty bad but luckily the glasses are in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: way too fragile
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and both have broken by simply dropping them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glasses - they are super comfortable, feels almost like you're not wearing anything. Lens quality is excellent, and I love the aviator shape without having the heavy rims. These are one of the best sunglasses I've ever owned. The only downside is that the lenses don't hug your face, so if the sun is directly overhead it still gets in your eyes. So if you're in a car with the sunroof open or out at mid-day you'll want a hat too.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely light, and seem very fragile, but are nice quality. Give you crisp image, look better in life actually. They come with a hard case, soft case, and you get them in a sealed Maui Jim's box, I suppose to ensure they are authentic. Nice glasses if you are looking for something featherlight!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Really like the weight and feel of the glasses though
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize there is a dark line along the middle of the glasses. Not visible from inside, and less visible outside on a sunny day. Really like the weight and feel of the glasses though. These are my third pair. Usually get the brown lenses.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sunglasses I have ever owned. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Feel like nothing on your face
customer_reviews.text: Feel like nothing on your face. Great SUN glasses!! Probably fragile so I will be very careful with them. Bought a pair of Sandy Beaches for my wife and realized that was a great way to go.
customer_reviews.author: claud

customer_reviews.title: Love These!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sunglasses and I have a lot. They are clear and light with a small temple bar which is nice since I wear a visor during outdoor activities. They are a little flimsy due to the fact they are rimless but that's going to come with just about any rimless glasses. I also love the fact that they stay secure on my face without giving me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Bethsb

customer_reviews.title: look and feel great. They are like wearing nothing at all
customer_reviews.text: Light, look and feel great. They are like wearing nothing at all. Great color and sun protection. My favorite sunglasses of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Icthus

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight. Snug tight to face if you like that. The lennes have no glare and make a sunny day clear, it's an experience like no other sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon A Shaw

customer_reviews.title: The best sunglasses I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had Oakleys, Arnettes, Spys, Pradas, Guccis, Serengetis, etc and nothing compares to the optical quality of these sunglasses. I choose this color because of looks and they do a fair decent shading protection, but the black ones should do an even better job. So far I'm really satisfied with my buy and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro E.

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim's Are The Best
customer_reviews.text: Lenses were too big for my face but they would have been perfect in every way otherwise! I love Maui Jim Sandy Beach glasses but decided to try Sugar Beach because of the reviews. I have had the same pair of Sandy Beach style for almost 8 year so I will stick with what I know!
customer_reviews.author: BellaBean

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, but a bit small vs. the one size fits all. I am Asian, so I need a wider frame and also don't have a very good bridge on my nose. A bit jealous of the thinner faced people. Good glasses, will keep them because they look good and are much lighter than Ray Bans.
customer_reviews.author: TKO

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best sunglasses you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar pair of Maui Jim sunglasses several years ago and was instantly impressed by how light and comfortable they were. I was even more impressed by the optics. My eyes are comfortable in even the most bright sun and colors are still vivid and beautiful. After over two years of almost constant use, the old pair is going back to MJ for some lens repairs but I will not be going back to cheapo glasses in the meantime. Try these glasses and you will know what I'm talking about.
customer_reviews.author: C. F. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHADES
customer_reviews.text: They take the glare away on land and sea. I'm confident my eyes are being protected from the damaging rays of the sun. They're light weight and comfortable !! LOVE them !!
customer_reviews.author: 14all

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sporty. Good for long hikes and beach !!
customer_reviews.text: These are just great, i had my RB aviators for couple of years now and i always owned one. But i always had my trouble with them when hiking or when going to beach. Normally i am not big fan of plastic glasses, but these are really really well made and stylish. Good thing is i can wear them for hours while hiking even with the humid conditions. Also they do not have too much of that plastic frame, so awesomely light weight and stylish look. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: veda vyas merla

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I couldn’t believe how much glare they block. They are light weight. There is nothing I don’t like. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joannee N.

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely lightweight and comfortable, but durable remains to be seen
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely lightweight and comfortable, but durable remains to be seen. The frames are very nice. I thought they'd be a bit large on my face, but they look perfect. The frame is very clean and clear, but does add a slight grey tinting to the view.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L Estes

customer_reviews.title: his favorite gift. He has had Maui Jim's for
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, but he LOVES these, his favorite gift. He has had Maui Jim's for,years, always this shape/ style. A great deal from AMAZON, too. I always check AMAZON before buying just about anything. With PRIME, got these immediately and very well- packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shades
customer_reviews.text: These came as expected and well worth the money I saved. Maui Jim's are expensive if you look anywhere else, $120 was a good price here. The lenses, nose and temple supports are thin and durable almost like the glasses are not there.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Came as described. These are now the only brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. These are now the only brand of sunglasses I wear. If you have not tried the Sugar Beach ones, do yourself a favor and order a pair. These weigh next to nothing, but fit well and don't move around.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not so much...
customer_reviews.text: Not as clear and not as well polarized.... not as good as the other Maui Jim glasses I have had in the past
customer_reviews.author: StephieB

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: They came with a small scratch. Design wise they made my husband looked like his eyes were very close together. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorgrl2

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ever spent over $100 for sunglasses. They are worth it! I can wear these all day long. They are so light. They don't rub you wrong on either the nose piece or the ear pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Inventorydude

customer_reviews.title: Maui jims are the best..
customer_reviews.text: Maui jims are the best... very light weight on the nose and excellent color and perception through the lenses exclamation
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! So lightweight I forget they are on my face/head! Perfect for running yet stylish enough to wear for everyday use as well.
customer_reviews.author: RaVo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glasses for beach, fishing, driving, you name it.
customer_reviews.text: Still have these glasses 6 years later. We have had them repaired by Maui Jim numerous times. Great lightweight glasses and perfect optics.
customer_reviews.author: JBarnhart

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this style for years and love these sunglasses! They are light weight, very stylish & offer polarized eye protection!. One word of CAUTION - the lenses are plastic and easily scratched, so you will need to baby them a bit...
customer_reviews.author: J. Vigneri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shades, only beef is that they're a little flimsy. Great lenses though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kaefring

customer_reviews.title: Love the sun glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Gloss Black Sugar Beach Aviator sun glasses. The seller was prompt and kept me advised on the progress of my order. I would not hesitate to order again.
customer_reviews.author: KarenG

customer_reviews.title: The best sunglasses ever invented
customer_reviews.text: I love them!! They are very light weight. I can wear them home in the evening without being completely blacked out. And they make my eyes feel amazing during the day. #sensitiveeyes
customer_reviews.author: Empress Benji14

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sunglasses Ever
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these are the best sunglasses I have ever owned they are form fitting to your face shape. They are very lightweight and comfortable. I have received many compliment on them and they look great on men and women!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very light, clear,  omfortable
customer_reviews.text: MAUI JIM sunglasses are the best of the many brands I have owned over 60+years. They were originally given to me as a gift but a new puppy ate them I immediately replaced them. I will probably purchase a spare
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Light as a Feather
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses - so light and flexible. They are perfect for sports and look very fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. So light weight and stay put on your face. Do not leave marks on the side of your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Katie F.

customer_reviews.title: Love My Maui Jims
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. They are stylish and very light. The lenses are great. I can see very well. I use them mainly for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Great color lens.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect if you like light, easy to wear sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love Maui Jims sunglasses - they are all I have worn for over 15 years and would not wear anything else ever! I also like the Hoolika (sp) Maui Mims they are wonderful these are the ones I have always had) the seller is fast and nice to work with his ID is: "stinkynalyd" Thank you, mmvsp
customer_reviews.author: Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this for couple years and lost it so bought a replacement because I love it so much. Got a new one in December just got it for a few months and it broke. Doesn't look like I can return it now. SMH.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Vu

customer_reviews.title: 1) I wish the frame was tortoise shell but I still like the brown color of the frames
customer_reviews.text: Awesom sunglasses! 1) I wish the frame was tortoise shell but I still like the brown color of the frames. It is sort of a bronze/ brown. 2) Maui jims are always lite on the face and these are no different 3) price is comparable to costa's and better in quality IMO. I don't have anything truly negative to say about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels great. The frame is light and flexible. Things look clear and glare-free through the lens. I have these black ones as well as the brown ones in the same model. Things look clearer looking through the brown lens.
customer_reviews.author: Wordup

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have photo phobia, so I specifically bought this ones for the beach. they are unisex, beautiful, light weight and everything looks clear.They seem durable. The case is hard, but compact, and has a clamp. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim never fails!!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair....still love them, light weight, replaced my old sports ones with this cool updated look. Great for foggy and sunshining weather.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: We love them!!! Very comfortable, I can run with them and teach swim lessons also. They are great do not allow glare to bother my eyes. While lifeguarding.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Benji14

customer_reviews.title: The perfect MJs!
customer_reviews.text: My MJs are perfect! The size was the right size and shape for my face and they fit nicely with every hat I wear. I'd definitely buy more from AMZ and Sellers and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bridges Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vision especially on a cloudy day
customer_reviews.text: So light weight you almost forgot they are on. Excellent vision especially on a cloudy day
customer_reviews.author: mcwilch

customer_reviews.title: They are light weight and good for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: They are light weight and good for outdoor use. Bad was it came with a green tag on the nose piece that you cant remove or you cant send them back. Next time I want to get sunglasses for riding my motorcycle I will go out and try them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Maui Jim Sugar Beach Aviator Sunglasses
product_meta.description: The clarity provided by these frames was inspired by the pristine, white sands of Sugar Beach. Like their namesake, these rimless polarized sunglasses provide unequaled clarity of vision and brightness of color with each and every look.
feature_bullets: Click the Maui Jim link above to visit our brand store, where you can find our entire catalog of sunglasses
All Maui Jim sunglasses feature PolarizedPlus2 lens technology that go beyond shielding your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays by enhancing colors to reveal the true beauty of the world around you
Enjoy ultimate UV protection combined with premium style, incredible durability, glare-free vision, and color-boosting patented technologies
Neutral Grey lenses offer the highest available light reduction and are most useful in bright, direct sunlight
Lenses made with MauiPure material for crisp optics and excellent shatter & scratch resistance
Frames constructed from lightweight, injected nylon, designed for extreme comfort and extended wear time
